interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Meetory 6 Pieces Korean Exfoliating Bath Washcloth, 2 Sizes Exfoliating Bath Cloth Towels Scrub Mitten for Skin Massage, Removing Dry Dead Skin Cells, Cleaning Pores(Blue Green Yellow Pink)
Review Date: 2021/07/28
Store: Meetory
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '9.06 x 5.91 x 0.39 inches; 2.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: I did not realize how much dead skin I had. Once using this product, it little comes off like little toilet paper rolls (I know gross). I usually use them on my husbands back. These are great to use before shaving to avoid getting ingrown hairs. I also use these once a week before applying self tanner. I use these after I have been in the shower for a few minutes and my skin has softened. Great product!
Review Title: Seriously cannot live without these
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl lootaan {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'} The nails are ok quality. They are thin and flexible. However, if your nails are on the small side, these may be challenging to use. I had to file the smallest size down to use on my pinky nails. They were decently easy to work with, but I was a little frustrated that the listing was not as described. I filed them with an e file. I began dipping my nails at home due to COVID. I am not a professional, but I am decent at working with nails. I will still use these, but I would not purchase again-especially because I can only use half of them. A little large and I did not receive clippers BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|10ML BEPHOLAN {'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 1.18 x 1.06 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} I have tried to use this product for 3 weeks, but I cannot see any difference. There is barely any product in the tube. It is practically dry. You have to reinsert the wand multiple times just to get any coverage on your lashes. I cannot tell any difference except maybe they are softer. I do feel like when I use mascara after this product, the lashes seem fuller. I was really hopeful to see growth.

Once I tried this product on my eyebrows, it seemed to make them fuller (what little product I could get out). I do not think this product is worth the price. I wish I would have got the mascara wand MIZON Cicaluronic Line, Cicaluronic Cleansing Balm, Makeup Remover, Centella Asiatica,Hyaluronic Acid, One Step Cleansing (2.7 fl oz) MIZON {'Package Dimensions': '2.99 x 2.91 x 2.05 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8809606850345'} I do like this cleanser, but beware if you have oily skin. It is super oily. I also do not feel like it takes off the dirt as well as other cleaners. My skin feels super soft after. I also think the packaging is super cute, and I appreciate the included applicator. I love products with hyaluronic acid, so I am a fan of this product, especially for morning use. Good Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers LOLYSENTA {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} I am by no means a professional. I just recently started derma rolling. I prefer to use the micro needle roller first. It isn’t the most comfortable feeling, but you get use to it. I do it while I am watching T.V. To distract myself. While rolling, I put the jade roller in the refrigerator. Once I finish with the micro needle, I apply hyaluronic acid, and then roll with the jade roller. It is SO SOOTHING. The roller has two sides- a large end for the planes of your face, and a small end to get in smaller areas like under your eyes. I only use the micro needle roller once a week-usually on Saturday nights. It does make your face a little red, but it goes away by morning. I use the jade roller a couple times a week, especially after stressful days. Just so you know, make sure to sterilize both rollers or you will have major breakouts from spreading bacteria around. I keep alcohol in a small spritzer to use on both before each use. The packaging was sufficient, and I would feel comfortable giving it as a gift. Great starter set! BH DERMCENTER Retinol Serum Restores Rejuvenates and Purifies Skin, 1 oz, Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines, Non-GMO, Vegan, Cruelty Free BH DERMCENTER {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BHDRETSER', 'UPC': '850004068076'} My garbage skin care routine finally caught up to me, so after doing some research, I decided on this retinol serum. I use it in the evening on clean skin. I like that the product is vegan and non gmo. They product has a nice scent and a great consistency. Since using this product, I feel as if my pores are smaller and my skin is more even overall with both color and lines. I will continue to use this product in my daily routine. Great affordable product Meetory 6 Pieces Korean Exfoliating Bath Washcloth, 2 Sizes Exfoliating Bath Cloth Towels Scrub Mitten for Skin Massage, Removing Dry Dead Skin Cells, Cleaning Pores(Blue Green Yellow Pink) Meetory {'Product Dimensions': '9.06 x 5.91 x 0.39 inches; 2.47 Ounces'} I did not realize how much dead skin I had. Once using this product, it little comes off like little toilet paper rolls (I know gross). I usually use them on my husbands back. These are great to use before shaving to avoid getting ingrown hairs. I also use these once a week before applying self tanner. I use these after I have been in the shower for a few minutes and my skin has softened. Great product! Seriously cannot live without these
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Care Enthusiast**: The user maintains a robust interest in nail aesthetics, particularly acrylic nails and at-home care applications.

- **Skill Level**: They possess moderate skills in nail application and maintenance, including experience with e-files for DIY enhancements.

- **Expanding Skincare Focus**: The user is increasingly invested in skincare, gravitating towards effective serums and products that enhance their complexion, with a preference for clean and ethical formulations.

- **Exfoliation Practices**: They have incorporated body exfoliation into their routine, using specific tools to remove dead skin, improve skin texture, and prepare for self-tanning, indicating a practical approach to skin health.

- **Practicality and Effectiveness**: They prioritize usability and results in beauty products, expressing frustration with those yielding minimal benefits.

- **Quality Sensitivity**: The user values high-quality materials and formulations, quickly expressing disappointment with purchases that do not meet their standards.

- **Shopping Behavior**: They are reluctant to repurchase underperforming items, indicating that past experiences greatly influence future decisions.

- **Adaptability and Resourcefulness**: Resourceful in modifying beauty products and routines, they seek ways to tailor their regimen to their needs.

- **Cautious Skepticism**: A careful approach is evident, especially with new products lacking immediate results; however, positive experiences encourage some openness to new options.

This profile highlights their strong focus on nail care and skincare, emphasizing a commitment to practicality, quality, and effective beauty applications.
